shortName: Difference In Pixel Values As An Image (Python)
description: This algorithm compares two images pixel by pixel and retains only those pixels that differ between the two compared images. A more advanced version of the native comparison function "Difference In Pixel Values As An Image," fully written in Python and integrated into the application as a plugin. It allows selecting the color of the points that mark the differing pixels.
fullName: Difference In Pixel Values As An Image (Python Plugin)
